context: can you hear game audio on this headset when not playing online?

context: I have some questions can you connect to ps3?| can you turn touchscreen off?
response: You can connect to the PS3 but Remote Play is limited to the small amount of games that support it, whereas every game in the PS4 library is supported by Remote Play. So keep that in mind. The other person answered the touchscreen question.

context: If my son gets this game & a 3D-XL for Xmas, but the other has only a regular DS-XL, can they still play together? or do both need 3DS players?
response: Not only would each person require a 3DS system, but they would also need to have their own copy of the game to play together.

context: Can these be used on a cell phone or tablet with standard audio jack?

context: can you play it on windows 8
Can you run an aux line in through the "Analog in" and hear that sound source as well as the sound source from the Optical in at the same time?
response: You can't. As soon as it detects audio from the analog in, it goes to that one instead.

context: One of my sons has an Xbox One,and the other has an xBox 360. Do we need 2 xbox live accounts or one?

context: Will I be able to continue from where I left of in the disc version of the game (which is now unreadable) or do I have to start all over again?
response: Yeah, save data is on the hard drive and can be accessed by the games on demand version or disk version, or both!
